metadata.title: CVE-2024-40969 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: don't set RO when shutting down f2fsShutdown does not check the error of thaw_super due to readonly, whichcauses a deadlock like below.f2fs_ioc_shutdown(F2FS_GOING_DOWN_FULLSYNC)        issue_discard_thread - bdev_freeze  - freeze_super - f2fs_stop_checkpoint()  - f2fs_handle_critical_error                     - sb_start_write    - set RO                                         - waiting - bdev_thaw  - thaw_super_locked    - return -EINVAL, if sb_rdonly() - f2fs_stop_discard_thread  -> wait for kthread_stop(discard_thread);
